abstract: Blackstone has raised about $700 million from wealthy individuals for a new fund intended expressly for this class of investors, a new and largely untapped source of capital for buyout firms.
snippet: Blackstone has raised about $700 million from wealthy individuals for a new fund intended expressly for this class of investors, a new and largely untapped source of capital for buyout firms.

headline.main: Blackstone Courts Wealthy Individuals With New Private Equity Fund
